not_configured_yet: Dongosolo silinakonzedwe panobe. Wizard iyi yokhazikitsira ikuthandizani kuti mukhazikitse dongosolo lanu ndikuyenda pang'onopang'ono.
system_config_start_with_base_and_backup: Bwezerani kuchokera ku fayilo yosunga zobwezeretsera
system_config_include_demo: Phatikizani chiwonetsero chokhala ndi zida zoyeserera
cronwizard_schedule_set_slot_end:
Kuyambira pa {{start}}.
 Khazikitsani nthawi yomaliza.
cronwizard_bindings_define_types_and_mod: Tanthauzirani mitundu ndi ma module omwe ali pansi pa ndondomekoyi (posankha)
cronwizard_action_schedule_variable_hint: Gwiritsani ntchito @{{name}} monga kusintha kwa mawu a cron kapena gwiritsani ntchito Scheduler.IsScheduling("@{{name}}") mumapulogalamu ongogwiritsa ntchito kuti muwonetsetse chochitikachi.
main_code_empty_note: Khodi "Yaikulu" ilibe kanthu. Gwiritsani ntchito mkonzi wa "Visual code" kuti mupange code iyi: - Tsegulani gulu la "Pulogalamu" kuchokera pamndandanda wamalamulo kumanzere - Kokani chipika chamtundu wa "Main" pamalo ogwirira ntchito - Onjezani mkati mwake ma code ena kuti mugwiritse ntchito ndi malingaliro a pulogalamuyi.
setup_code_empty_note: Khodi ya "kukhazikitsa" ilibe kanthu. Gwiritsani ntchito mkonzi wa "Visual code" kuti mupange code iyi: - Tsegulani gulu la "Program" kuchokera pamawu olamula kumanzere - Kokani chipika chamtundu wa "Setup" mu malo ogwirira ntchito - Onjezani mkati mwake ma code ena kuti mudziwe zomwe zingayambitse "Main" kukhazikitsa kachidindo Code iyi imawunikiridwa nthawi iliyonse chochitika chatsopano chichitika komanso kamodzi pa mphindi imodzi.
capture_commands_description: Onjezani malamulo onse opangidwa pamanja pa ma widget ku pulogalamuyi.

16.Title: Memory Level
16.Description: Sungani ndikukumbukira mulingo womaliza wa dimmer.

26.Title: Zowala Zamitundu
26.Description: Chitsanzo cha kuyatsa kwa Philips Hue pogwiritsa ntchito HTTP API (V1). Wosakhazikika woti alumikizane ndi mlatho ndi "wopanga zatsopano" ndipo uyenera kukhala woyatsidwa kale.

34.Title: Weather Forecast
34.Description: Zanyengo ndi zolosera zochokera ku ntchito ya Open Weather Map. Kuti mutsegule widget iyi lowetsani kiyi yolondola ya API. Tsatirani malangizo pa https://openweathermap.org/appid kuti mupeze kiyi yaulere ya API.

77.Title: Mtengo MQTT
77.Description: Lumikizanani ndi broker wa MQTT kuti mugwiritse ntchito pulogalamu ya HomeGenie Panel kuchokera kulikonse kudzera pa intaneti kapena kulumikiza zida za HomeGenie pa netiweki yomweyo ya MQTT.
77.MQTT.SensorPublish: Sindikizani zochitika zomwe zatulutsidwa ndi gawoli

78.Title: Smart Thermostat
78.Description: Gwiritsani ntchito sensa iliyonse ya kutentha ndi kusintha kwanzeru kuti mugwiritse ntchito mawonekedwe a thermostat.
78.ConfigureOptions.EnsureCommandDelivery: Onetsetsani kuti lamulo laperekedwa ndi kutumiza kosalekeza (pulse-mode).

81.Title: Mphamvu Monitor
81.Description: Pangani ziwerengero pakugwiritsa ntchito mphamvu ndikugwiritsa ntchito zida.

82.Title: Njira Yopulumutsira Mphamvu
82.Description: Sungani mlingo wa kuwala pansi pa chiwerengero chosinthika.

88.Title: generic IP kamera
88.Description: Onetsani / mayendedwe azithunzi kuchokera ku kamera ya IP.
88.IpCamera.ImageURL: Ulalo wa chithunzi cha kamera (onani zolemba za kamera yanu)

90.Title: Security Alamu System
90.Description: Gwiritsani ntchito masensa ndi zida zina kukhazikitsa ma alarm system.
90.ConfigureOptions.Email.Recipients: Mndandanda wolekanitsidwa wa koma wa olandira maimelo a zidziwitso zama alarm
90.ConfigureOptions.Trigger.ArmedProgram: Pulogalamu yoyendetsa pamene muli ndi zida

111.Title: Kusintha kwa Makasitomala
111.Description: Imakhazikitsa API yoyang'anira ma profailo a kasitomala omwe amagwiritsidwa ntchito kusunga UI ndi ma dashboards.

400.Title: Chiwonetsero cha Virtual Modules
400.Description: Khazikitsani pamanja makonda a chipangizo chowona.

401.Title: Chiwonetsero - Toggle Door
401.Description: Imatengera chitseko chotseguka / chotsekedwa cha sensor yazenera lazenera.

402.Title: Chiwonetsero - Zoyenda Zapezeka
402.Description: Imatsanzira kuzindikira koyenda kwa ma sensa ambiri.

505.Title: Kuwongolera Kwakutali
505.Description: Yang'anirani chipangizocho pogwiritsa ntchito chakutali (IR kapena RF).

142.Title: Akaunti ya Imelo
142.Description: Imasunga zidziwitso zamaakaunti a imelo omwe amagwiritsidwa ntchito ndi mapulogalamu otumizira/kulandira maimelo.
142.ConfigureOptions.Email.SmtpUseSsl: 6. Seva ya SMTP imagwiritsa ntchito SSL

145.Title: Smart Chipangizo
145.Description: Yatsani/zimitsani chipangizochi potengera kuzindikira koyenda komanso kuwala kozungulira.

8.Title: Mtundu wa Sunrise Colours
8.Description: Chitsanzo "Kutuluka kwa Dzuwa" pakusintha mitundu ya nyali za LED.
8.Scenarios.SunriseColors: Lumikizani ku zochitika za Sunrise Colors

910.Title: Kuzindikira kwa chinthu
910.Description: Dziwani zinthu pogwiritsa ntchito mtundu wa YOLO wophunzitsidwa kale.
910.ML.ObjectDetection.TriggerDetect: Mndandanda wazinthu zosiyanitsidwa ndi koma (mu Chingerezi) zomwe zingayambitse alamu. (monga: mphaka, galu, munthu, chikwama, sutikesi)
910.ConfigureOptions.Yolo.ModelPath: Njira ya fayilo yachitsanzo ya YOLO (.onnx)

911.Title: Pose Kuyerekeza
911.Description: Kuzindikira mfundo zazikuluzikulu pogwiritsa ntchito kuyerekezera kwazithunzi, pogwiritsa ntchito mitundu ya ONNX yokhazikika kapena mtundu wa YOLO wophunzitsidwa kale (mawonekedwe amunthu).
911.ConfigureOptions.Yolo.ModelPath: Njira ya fayilo yachitsanzo ya YOLO (.onnx)

912.Title: Gawo lachitsanzo
912.Description: Dziwani zinthu ndi ma autilaini awo pogwiritsa ntchito chitsanzo cha YOLO chophunzitsidwa kale.
912.ConfigureOptions.Yolo.ModelPath: Njira ya fayilo yachitsanzo ya YOLO (.onnx)

930.Title: Gemini Intent Handler
930.Description: Imayatsa kuwongolera zilankhulo zachilengedwe pamakina anu anzeru pogwiritsa ntchito Google's Gemini AI. Kuti mutsegule izi, lowetsani kiyi yolondola ya API. Tsatirani malangizo pa https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey kuti mupeze kiyi yaulere ya API.
930.ConfigureOptions.SendContextData: Gawani dongosolo ndi gawo ndi AI

931.Title: Gemini Widget Genie
931.Description: AI genie wanu wopanga widget. Mothandizidwa ndi Gemini, imakuthandizani kulemba ndikusintha HTML, CSS, ndi JavaScript code mwachindunji mkati mwa mkonzi wa HomeGenie. Kuti mutsegule izi, lowetsani kiyi yolondola ya API. Tsatirani malangizo pa https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey kuti mupeze kiyi yaulere ya API.

940.Title: AI Yapafupi
940.Description: Yendetsani ma LLM apamwamba kwambiri mwachindunji pa seva yanu ya HomeGenie. Muli ndi API yonse yowongolera AI kuchokera ku mapulogalamu ena ndi zolemba.
940.ConfigureOptions.ModelPath: Njira yopita ku fayilo ya GGUF yakomweko
940.ConfigureOptions.ContextSize: Kutha Kukumbukira kwa AI (Zenera la Nkhani)
940.ConfigureOptions.MaxTurns: Memory ya Macheza (Maulendo Aakulu) (0 = palibe malire)
940.ConfigureOptions.SendContextData: Gawani dongosolo ndi gawo ndi AI

575.Title: Woyang'anira Tsitsani
575.Description: Utumiki wamphamvu komanso wosasinthasintha wa HTTP(S) wosamutsa mafayilo womwe umapezeka kudzera mu API yapadera. Umayang'anira moyo wonse wotsitsa, kuthandizira kuyimitsa/kuyambiranso (pogwiritsa ntchito mitu ya Range) ndi kusamalira mafayilo kwakanthawi (.part).

576.Title: Woyang'anira Mafayilo
576.Description: Utumiki wotetezeka, woyendetsedwa ndi API wowerengera ndi kulemba mafayilo mkati mwa chikwatu cha deta ya pulogalamuyo. Umathandizira zonse ziwiri za raw binary ndi UTF-8 string content kudzera mu malamulo apadera a ReadText ndi WriteText.

577.Title: Utumiki wa Mbiri ya Macheza
577.Description: Utumiki wa HomeGenie wokhazikika wowongolera ndi kusunga zolemba za macheza a AI. Kudzera mu API yogwirizana (System.Utility/ChatHistory), imapereka ma LLM amtambo ndi am'deralo okhala ndi zinthu zogawana, malo osungira a JSON okha, komanso kasamalidwe ka mbiri yakale nthawi yeniyeni.

578.Title: Injini Yogwirizana
578.Description: Utumiki wapakati wopangira AI mwachangu. Umadzaza ma tempuleti ndi mndandanda wa zida zowongolera komanso momwe makina amagwirira ntchito (nyengo, mphamvu, masensa), kuonetsetsa kuti chidziwitso chonse cha AI chikuchitika panyumba nthawi yeniyeni.

570.Title: Chowunikira Deta
570.Description: Utumiki wowunikira wapakati pa ziwerengero zakale za module. Umathandizira kupeza deta ya nthawi pogwiritsa ntchito zosefera zokonzera zizindikiro (Simple Average, Moving Average, Savitzky-Golay) kuti upereke deta yoyera komanso yosalala ya ma chart ndi kuwunika kwa makina.

571.Title: Ziwerengero Zogwiritsira Ntchito Mphamvu
571.Description: Imayang'anira, kusonkhanitsa, ndi kulemba deta yogwiritsira ntchito mphamvu (Wh) nthawi zonse. Imagwiritsa ntchito API yonse yofufuzira ndi kufufuza ma data akale.

572.Title: Chitsanzo cha ziwerengero za tchati cha pie
572.Description: Chitsanzo cha wopereka tchati chomwe chimawoneka ngati tchati cha pie chokhala ndi data yosasinthika.

573.Title: Kugwiritsa Ntchito Mphamvu Sabata Lililonse
573.Description: Tchati cha mipiringidzo chomwe chikuwonetsa kuchuluka kwa ma Watts/Ola omwe amagwiritsidwa ntchito tsiku lililonse la sabata (Lolemba-Lamlungu). Deta imasonkhanitsidwa m'maola onse a tsikulo ndipo imachokera ku Energy Use Statistics API.

574.Title: Kugwiritsa Ntchito Mphamvu pa Ola Lililonse
574.Description: Tchati cha mipiringidzo chomwe chikuwonetsa kuchuluka kwa ma Watts/Ola omwe amagwiritsidwa ntchito pa ola lililonse la tsiku (00h-23h). Deta imasonkhanitsidwa pamodzi pa sabata yosankhidwa ndikupeza kuchokera ku Energy Use Statistics API.

579.Title: Chidule cha Mphamvu za Tsiku ndi Tsiku
579.Description: Kugwiritsa ntchito mphamvu tsiku ndi tsiku (Wh) pogwiritsa ntchito chipangizo.
579.Widget.Statistics.DailyReport: Phatikizani mu lipoti la Daily Wh

scheduler_preset_action_config_wish.plac: Yesani: "Ikani kutentha pa 22Â° ndipo yambani chiwonetsero cha Kutuluka kwa Dzuwa"
